title: Grant admin access to provided Internet Identity principal

requirements.text: Grant admin role permissions to the Internet Identity Principal "7bzkw-ue5am-s2c6f-jvpfm-5uxw7-dkk76-u56hj-psrgc-hja4r-mztcz-xqe" so that this principal can access the admin dashboard and perform admin-only backend actions (e.g., configuring Stripe, managing products/bundles/uploads).
acceptanceCriteria: When logged in as principal 7bzkw-ue5am-s2c6f-jvpfm-5uxw7-dkk76-u56hj-psrgc-hja4r-mztcz-xqe, navigating to admin routes no longer shows the "Access Denied" state and admin pages render normally.
Backend calls protected by admin checks (e.g., setStripeConfiguration, createProduct, updateProduct, createBundle) succeed for this principal.
Non-admin principals continue to be denied access to admin routes and admin-only backend methods.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; do not introduce additional backend services.
Do not modify frontend files under frontend/immutablePaths (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui/*).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Building a general-purpose UI for managing admins/roles (beyond granting access to the provided principal).
Adding or changing any non-admin storefront functionality.
